Room.Name: West Hafnia Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You have walking along the main shopping district in Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: The elves of Hafnia are known for their trading. To the north, you see an armory. To the south is a tavern for weary travelers to get a cold beer. For the first time, you look into the sky and notice how clear it is. Amazing how such a small community could thrive as it does.
